name: spiky-shield
effect: Blocks damaging attacks and damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP.
short_effect: Blocks damaging attacks and damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP.

flavor_text.x-y: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker who makes direct contact.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker who makes direct contact.
